item.description:
June's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: What a character!

Every month we end up talking about characters. For example, in May, we mentioned Orson Scott Card's tips about distinguishing between major, minor, and walk-on characters. We're all struggling with learning how to create sympathetic characters.

Challenge: Find a story with a character you love. How did the writer do that to you? Dig into the text and find where it shows one aspect of what makes the character so compelling. Be prepared to cite your example.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: What a character!

5:00 Break
Open Discussion

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers June Meeting
